title: Promo skins

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hi

Having a few problems redeeming my promo code skins for Riot Girl Tristana and Dreadknight Garen (evidence of getting the codes is attached) was wondering if you could help me out.

Thanks.

replies.body: Sorry for the trouble!  I've added the juggernaut and feisty yordle to your account!
